languages.text: "Поэтому все наши осколки были расположены так близко к тебе и владениям фон Валанциус. Мы рассчитывали, что она обнаружит нас. Защитит и окажет содействие".
"That was why every one of our shards was located so close to you and to the von Valancius domain. We were counting on her finding us. And extending us her aid and protection."
languages.original_text: "Поэтому все наши осколки были расположены так близко к тебе и владениям фон Валанциус. Мы рассчитывали, что она обнаружит нас. Защитит и окажет содействие".

traits.locale_text: "That was why every one of our shards was located so close to you and to the von Valancius domain. We were counting on her finding us. And extending us her aid and protection."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That was why every one of our shards was located so close to you and to the von Valancius domain. We were counting on her finding us. And extending us her aid and protection."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「それが、我々の欠片のすべてが陛下とフォン・ヴァランシウスの支配域に集まっていた理由だ。我々はシオドーラが探し出してくれると思っていた。その援助と保護にあずかれるとも」
languages.original_text: "That was why every one of our shards was located so close to you and to the von Valancius domain. We were counting on her finding us. And extending us her aid and protection."

traits.locale_text: 「それが、我々の欠片のすべてが陛下とフォン・ヴァランシウスの支配域に集まっていた理由だ。我々はシオドーラが探し出してくれると思っていた。その援助と保護にあずかれるとも」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “正是由于这个原因，我们的每块碎片都离你和冯·瓦兰修斯王朝领地很近。我们曾指望她能找到我们，给予我们帮助与保护。”
languages.original_text: "That was why every one of our shards was located so close to you and to the von Valancius domain. We were counting on her finding us. And extending us her aid and protection."

traits.locale_text: “正是由于这个原因，我们的每块碎片都离你和冯·瓦兰修斯王朝领地很近。我们曾指望她能找到我们，给予我们帮助与保护。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « C'est pour cette raison que chacun de nos fragments se trouvait non loin de vous et du domaine von Valancius. Nous avions espoir qu'elle nous trouve. Et qu'elle nous apporte son aide. »
languages.original_text: "That was why every one of our shards was located so close to you and to the von Valancius domain. We were counting on her finding us. And extending us her aid and protection."

traits.locale_text: « C'est pour cette raison que chacun de nos fragments se trouvait non loin de vous et du domaine von Valancius. Nous avions espoir qu'elle nous trouve. Et qu'elle nous apporte son aide. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Por eso todos nuestros fragmentos estaban tan cerca de usted y del dominio von Valancius. Teníamos la fe de que nos encontrase y nos proporcionase ayuda y protección».
languages.original_text: "That was why every one of our shards was located so close to you and to the von Valancius domain. We were counting on her finding us. And extending us her aid and protection."

traits.locale_text: «Por eso todos nuestros fragmentos estaban tan cerca de usted y del dominio de von Valancius. Teníamos la fe de que nos encontrase y nos proporcionase ayuda y protección».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Darum befanden sich alle unsere Splitter in Eurer Nähe und in der des Valancius-Reichs. Wir haben darauf gezählt, dass sie uns findet. Und uns ihre Hilfe und ihren Schutz gewährt."
languages.original_text: "That was why every one of our shards was located so close to you and to the von Valancius domain. We were counting on her finding us. And extending us her aid and protection."

traits.locale_text: "Darum befanden sich alle unsere Splitter in Eurer Nähe und in der des Valancius-Reichs. Wir haben darauf gezählt, dass sie uns findet. Und uns ihre Hilfe und ihren Schutz gewährt."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Her bir parçamızın senin ve von Valancius diyarının yakınlarında olmasının sebebi buydu. Theodora'nın bizi bulacağına, yardım edip koruma sağlayacağına güveniyorduk."
languages.original_text: "That was why every one of our shards was located so close to you and to the von Valancius domain. We were counting on her finding us. And extending us her aid and protection."

traits.locale_text: "Parçalarımızın her birinin sana ve von Valancius sahasına yakın konumlarda olmasının sebebi buydu. Theodora'nın bizi bulacağına ve bize yardım ve koruma sağlayacağına güveniyorduk."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
